title.narrative: Rural Development: Developing Business with the Rural Poor Programme

description.narrative: Key programme objectives. The Programme goal is sustainable and equitable reduction in rural poverty, which is in strong harmony with the policies and strategies set out in Viet Nam''s Socio-Economic Development Plan (SEDP) 2006-2010. The purpose is that rural poor benefit from improved market participation in Ben Tre and Cao Bang Provinces. Policy and institutional objectivesThe Programme will improve the business and investment environment by creating a legislative/ regulatory framework and institutional capacity to enable profitable enterprise investments and improve business development services along value chains both to support farmers and to increase the contribution of intermediate enterprises.

name.narrative: Rural Development: Developing Business with the Rural Poor Programme

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
